trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>物件與其他類型。

trans-unit.source: The ModifierKeysConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter.
trans-unit.target: ModifierKeysConverter 將轉換的<xref:System.String>做為分隔符號使用的"+"字元。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+ALT` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> object consisting of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> keys.
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串`Control+ALT`會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>物件，內含<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>

trans-unit.source: This behavior differs from the default XAML parser-level enumeration combine character of ",".
trans-unit.target: 此行為不同於預設 XAML 剖析器層級的列舉型別結合起來的字元的"，"。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeysConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeysConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定之類型的物件是否可以轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子就要從中叫用的環境的相關資訊會提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所評估的類型。

trans-unit.source: if sourceType is type ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if sourceType is type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷執行個體是否<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>可以轉換成指定的型別，並使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子就要從中叫用的環境的相關資訊會提供格式內容。

trans-unit.target: 轉換所評估的類型。

trans-unit.target: if destinationType is type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指定的物件轉換成<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeysConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeysConverter>將轉換的<xref:System.String>做為分隔符號使用的"+"索引鍵。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeysConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+ALT` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> consisting of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> keys.
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串`Control+ALT`會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>組成<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>
